email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to ship 50,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam in November. Could you provide us with your best freight rate and available vessel options?

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, which is available for loading around November 10th. The freight rate is $25/MT on a CIF basis.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Jane Smith
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $25/MT seems a bit high. Could you consider $22/MT? Additionally, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
John,

We can adjust the rate to $23/MT, which is our best offer. The MV OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300 meters. The laycan is November 10-15.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Jane Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Jane,

$23/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN STAR with a laycan of November 10-15. Could you also confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
John,

Thank you for confirming. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. I will send over the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Jane Smith
